title: Doctor Who
brief_description: The adventures of a Time Lord — a time-travelling humanoid alien known as the Doctor — who explores the universe in his TARDIS, a sentient time-travelling space ship. Along with a succession of companions, the Doctor saves civilisations, helps ordinary people and rights wrongs.

constellations_other.name: Lost and found
constellations_other.description: Blossoming from Alice Guy Blaché’s The Cabbage-Patch Fairy, this Constellation explores the impermanence and enduring nature of the moving image.

description: The adventures of a Time Lord — a time-travelling humanoid alien known as the Doctor — who explores the universe in his TARDIS, a sentient time-travelling space ship. Its exterior appears as a blue British police box, which was a common sight in Britain in 1963 when the series first aired. Along with a succession of companions, the Doctor faces a variety of foes while working to save civilisations, help ordinary people, and right wrongs.
description_for_label: The adventures of a Time Lord — a time-travelling humanoid alien known as the Doctor — who explores the universe in his TARDIS, a sentient time-travelling space ship. Its exterior appears as a blue British police box, which was a common sight in Britain in 1963 when the series first aired. Along with a succession of companions, the Doctor faces a variety of foes while working to save civilisations, help ordinary people, and right wrongs.
